channel.title: The Trail Busters
channel.description: The Trail Busters podcast explores the realm of outdoor adventures. Three friends, Ethan, Bing and Will, share the good, the bad, and the goofy experiences of their outdoor adventures.
channel.itunes:summary: The Trail Busters podcast explores the realm of outdoor adventures. Three friends, Ethan, Bing and Will, share the good, the bad, and the goofy experiences of their outdoor adventures.
channel.itunes:author: Ethan Aubuchon, Bing Lin, and Will Damon

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Ethan Aubuchon, Bing Lin, and Will Damon

channel.managingEditor: email@example.com (Ethan Aubuchon, Bing Lin, and Will Damon)
channel.itunes:subtitle: Talking Outdoors and Adventure

item.title: Gearing_up_for_adventure
item.description: layout: podcast title: “Gearing Up for Adventure” slug: “ep1” date: 2020-07-16 08:00:00 explicit: false categories: [“hiking”, “camping”, “outdoors”, “adventure”, “travel”, “gear”] author: Ethan Aubuchon, Bing Lin, and Will Damon pocast_file: the-trail-busters-ep1-gearing-up-for-adventure.mp3 podcast_summary: “In this episode, we dive into the gear each of us carries, loves, loathes, and yearns.” podcast_image: “/imgs/trailbusters-01.png”...
